Articles.Content:
I found Jeb piloting an Eagle in Elite Dangerous.

![5E1073FB36089C0CA5F4129B58089FDB0598DF4A](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/43130180932320911/5E1073FB36089C0CA5F4129B58089FDB0598DF4A/)

[http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=463513240](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=463513240)
Moved to the off-topic lounge, since it's not actually about KSP itself.

Not a game, but there's a city called "Kerman" in California, USA:

![530588434c43f07aa18a2ee03f9a4c13.png](http://i.gyazo.com/530588434c43f07aa18a2ee03f9a4c13.png)

> 
> Not a game, but there's a city called "Kerman" in California, USA:
> [http://i.gyazo.com/530588434c43f07aa18a2ee03f9a4c13.png](http://i.gyazo.com/530588434c43f07aa18a2ee03f9a4c13.png)

There's also a city in Iran named Kerman:

![ETmbiEA.png](http://i.imgur.com/ETmbiEA.png)

Coincidentally, my mom went to a university there (Shahid Bahonar University).
I am sure someone found a Kerbal doll somewhere in X-Rebirth.
